name: Ice Tank
description:
Somewhere in the arctic, an army of ancient robots have been discovered, and only you can stop them from taking over the world!

Move your mouse to move the ice tank and click to fire! This will change the direction you are facing.

Dodge and destroy the evil robots!

Collect ice to use as ammo!

This game was made for the OpenGameArt Winter Game Jam 2022. This jam requires you to use at least 6 assets from OpenGameArt.org.

CREDITS:

Assets Free Laser Bullets Pack 2020 | OpenGameArt.org

Top down vehicle | OpenGameArt.org

Top-Down: Robot | OpenGameArt.org

Magic SFX Sample | OpenGameArt.org

Adventure Theme | OpenGameArt.org

Fonts used: Aladin and Comic Neue
